overview: Lesbian erotica with a twist. Jodi is always in search of beautiful women who truly love the sexual company of other girls. In this latest edition of Beautiful Bi-Sexual Girlfriends, she finds several, to include a couple of young girls who want to take their friendship from besties to lesbian lovers. Watch as Jodi lovingly shows them the way! Starring Jodi West along with Cadence Luxx, Alexis Tae, Kiarra Kai and Dava Foxx with bonus scenes including Nina Elle and Reagan Foxx!
title: Beautiful Bi-Sexual Girlfriends 3
